thread.title: Boston’s Hip-Hop Lyricist, Who’s Recognized for His Talent, Releases Music Video, IDB - I Don’t Believe It!
thread.title_full: Boston’s Hip-Hop Lyricist, Who’s Recognized for His Talent, Releases Music Video, IDB - I Don’t Believe It!

author: YouKnowKZ Team
title: Boston’s Hip-Hop Lyricist, Who’s Recognized for His Talent, Releases Music Video, IDB - I Don’t Believe It!
text:
Kae-Z, a talented and diverse lyricist who sounds admirable in Boston’s hip-hop music community. His inspiration comes from lyrical rappers such as Drake, Nas, Jay-Z, Joe Buddens, SwaggaBoyLos and J.Cole. Kae-Z’s style and quality of work have become unique as his anticipations grow in sparking the next generational wave of hip-hop music, nationwide. Kae-Z has performed at numerous music clubs, featured by other local rappers and has opened music performances for known lyrical hip-hop artists. He arouses his fans and notably, his talent is greatly appreciated. So it comes as no surprise that his music is already being heard on local radio stations such as 101.3 and 87.7. When performing, listener’s would say that Kae-Z is far from amateur, sounds like Drake, and may be what the future of hip-hop needs. “My ambition is to progress as a talented lyricist in the hip-hop industry while being acknowledged by others for my aptitude, hard work and dedication.”
To view Kae-Z's IDB - I Don’t Believe It video, click on this link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4rYgtNWoA2s
This video was made possible in support of CLo Stacks, who filmed and edited the video; and in loving memory of Ashlee Berryman (7/23/94 - 8/13/2015).
More information is available on Kae-Z’s social media pages: Facebook (YouKnowKz), Twitter (@YouKnowKz) and Webpage at http://www.youknowkz.com .
